newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nissan Stagea exceeds sales target.
newsitem.headline: Nissan Stagea exceeds sales target.

text.p: Nissan Motor Co Ltd said it had received 10,137 domestic orders for its new Stagea station wagon in the first 19 days after its launch.
Nissan started marketing the Stagea luxury station wagon on October 3 with a monthly sales target of 5,000 units.
Nissan's Murayama plant, in a suburb of Tokyo, will operate for longer hours in October and for three extra days in November to keep up with the orders.
The four-wheel-drive version of the station wagon accounted for 60 percent of the total orders.
